channel.title: Is it possible to change item id?
channel.description: I want to know if it is possible to change customs item's id...is there a way?

item.title: Is it possible to change item id?
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

ye easy.
in your clients files, click on class8.java
then search for the name or id of the custom that u have and there will be a name, examine info, id, wield models etc…
then change the id number to your desired one (must be greater than 7900 or w/e or it will overlap with an existing item*) then save, compile ur client, and ur done

*unless thats wat u want to do

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to change item id?
